author: trawick
msg: use the apr_status_t instead of errno

author: trawick
msg: get rid of a non-portable use of errno
don't return errno as an error flag after an APR function fails; return
something guaranteed to be non-zero on all platforms

author: trawick
msg: get rid of some bogus uses of perror()

msg: fix subclassing mechanism so the the value of an `r' or `_r' key can
